div.class: col-md-6 col-lg-6 widget-background-alt fixed-height-widget pe-widget widget widget_text

div.p: The mission of the Ontonagon Area School District, in concert with the community, is to educate all students to reach their highest potential and be productive members of society.

h4.a: Notice of April 20th, 2020 Regular Board Meeting via teleconference
Continuity of Learning Plan for OASD

div.p: Support the Ontonagon Area School District: shop online by clicking one of the retailers below and earn money for the OASD 24/7, 365 days a year. The prices are the same as the regular websites and the school receives a portion for every online purchase. Turn off ad-block software to see the links.
